summary: In Astro, when you use a UI framework you have the ability to only load the island of JavaScript when it becomes in view of the browser window.  When you use web components, you have to build this functionality out yourself.  This is exactly what I did in my new web component NPM package, in-view...
title: in-view, A Web Component for Loading In View

title: Reading Mojo

summary:
Hugo keeps a resources directory that is used to cache asset pipeline output across builds. 
Running hugo build for the first time processes all static assets to apply any specified transformations1.  Subsequent runs leverage cache in the resources directory to process only what is necessary for a given build...
title: Caching Hugo resources in Forgejo actions
